translations: n.（尤指法国的）地铁，地铁系统；大城市

sentences.sentence: A new metro runs under the square, carrying hundreds of thousands who used to cycle to work.
sentences.translation: 一条新地铁在广场下面运行，载着数以千计过去骑自行车上班的人们。

sentences.sentence: With the exception of South Africa, the only light rail metro system in sub-Saharan Africa is in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
sentences.translation: 除了南非，非洲撒哈拉以南地区唯一的轻轨地铁系统位于埃塞俄比亚的亚的斯亚贝巴。

sentences.sentence: Living in France, I take the metro every day.
sentences.translation: 生活在法国，我每天都会乘坐地铁。
